values: 课；课程；功课；课业；一节课；一课时；教学单元；教训；经验；指导；训诫；启示；（教堂礼拜中的）《圣经》选读
教课；教导；教训；指导；惩戒；训诫；告诫；警告

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指班级或全体学生用. class 5
指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。
从“班级”引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示“(一节)课”。

word_group.brief_definition: 吸取教训；得到教训；引以为戒
重要功课；重要经验；重要教训
宝贵的教训；有价值的课程
历史课；历史教训；历史的教训
课程计划；授课计划；教案
惨痛的教训；痛苦的教训
严酷教训；严厉教训；深刻的教训
关键教训；重要课程；重大教训
网络课程；以织物为基础的课程

bilingual.source: How do we know that Anne was not interested in the lesson?
bilingual.target: 我们怎么知道安对课程不感兴趣？

bilingual.source: Even though the lesson was over the children wanted to stay.
bilingual.target: 尽管课程结束了，孩子们还是想留下。

bilingual.source: Ask children to walk around the room to check out charts or pictures that help them complete a lesson.
bilingual.target: 让孩子们在教室里走动，查看有助于完成课程的图表或图片。
这节课程将在上午9点开始。

bilingual.source: The teacher used courseware to make the lesson more interactive.
bilingual.target: 老师使用课程软件使课程更加互动。
老师介绍了今天的课程内容。

bilingual.source: The lesson on history was very interesting.
bilingual.target: 这节历史课程非常有趣。

bilingual.source: She always takes notes during the lesson.
bilingual.target: 她总是在课程期间做笔记。

bilingual.source: He missed the lesson because he was sick.
bilingual.target: 他因为生病错过了这节课程。

bilingual.source: The teacher is accenting the key points of the lesson.
bilingual.target: 老师在强调课程的重点。

list.abstract: 《LESSON》是由歌手KEN THE 390演唱的一首日语歌曲，于2010年4月7日发行，收录于专辑《NEW ORDER》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Then not only did you violate the rules, you also failed to understand the principle lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样说的话，那你就不光违反了条令，同时你对课程原则的理解也有错误。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, or you can teach him a lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也可以给他一个教训。

yingyinNormal.en: Meant to impart a greater lesson. Which is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是为了告诉人们一个教训。什么教训？

yingyinNormal.en: No! What is the point of this horrible lesson?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要啊，上这种可怕的课有什么意义？

yingyinNormal.en: The lesson here is never do business with the government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 教训就是千万不要跟政府做生意。

yingyinNormal.en: Father, may we continue with the lesson? I seek knowledge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸 我们可以继续上课吗？我渴望知识。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess we've all learned a lesson today. What was the lesson? I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我们今天都学到了一课。我们学到了什么呀？我也不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna go down there and teach that guy a lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我下去教训他。

yingyinNormal.en: Lesson over. Yeah, it's a good thing you invited me here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这节课上完了，你邀请我到这儿来真是太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: No! 'Sup, Riles? Pop's lesson hitting a little close to home?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别说了。咋了，莱丽？你老爸的课和现实联系得有点紧密哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Luke, quick lesson. This is a coaster. It prevents rings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢克，给你上一课，这是杯垫，能避免杯子留水印。

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome to your first flying lesson. What are you waiting for?
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在上第一堂飞行课，你们还等什么？

yingyinNormal.en: E: I learn a big lesson. Let's go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后，我得到一个大教训，来来来，我们赶紧出发，出发！

yingyinNormal.en: It is a school day. Peppa and her friends are having a music lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是上学的日子，佩奇和她的朋友们在上音乐课。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, does a good student drink seven beers during his first lesson?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好学生会在上第一堂课时喝掉七罐啤酒？

yingyinNormal.en: It is a school day. Peppa and her friends are having a music lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是上课日。佩佩和她的朋友们正在上音乐课。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm working on my lesson plan for Wolowitz. He is going to be so lost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在为沃罗威茨量身定制教学计划，保证他跟听天书一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Amy is free. She had a harp lesson on Saturday, but it got canceled...
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米有空。她本来周六要上竖琴课，但后来取消了……

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I must say, that may not be a lesson you wanna reinforce with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不得不说，你可千万记得不要再逼我干嘛了。

yingyinNormal.en: Man, you just can't get out of here without the life lesson thing, can ya?
yingyinNormal.zh: 晕，你们不给我上一堂人生经验课是不会放心离开的对么？

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸取教训；得到教训；引以为戒

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a thing learned by experience; punishment intended as a warning to others

examination_example.sentence: Every time we fail at something, we can choose to look for the <highlight>lesson</highlight> we're meant to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当我们在某件事上失败时，我们可以选择寻找我们应该学习的教训。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps it's time to learn a few <highlight>lessons</highlight> from them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许是时候从中吸取一些教训了。

examination_example.sentence: He analyzes the weak lecture, learning <highlight>lessons</highlight> for the future about what works and what doesn't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他会分析这次不成功的演讲，哪些地方可取，哪些不可取，为将来的演讲积累经验。

examination_example.sentence: Although ethics classes are common around the world, scientists are unsure if their <highlight>lessons</highlight> can actually change behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管道德课程在世界各地都很普遍，但科学家们不确定他们的课程是否真的可以改变行为。

examination_example.sentence: The high-schoolers get the same curriculum, but "we try to gear <highlight>lessons</highlight> toward things they're interested in," said Victoria Friedman, an instructor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高中生会学习同样的课程，但是 “我们会试着调整我们的课程以适应他们感兴趣的东西，” 讲师维多利亚·弗里德曼说道。

examination_example.sentence: In delivering <highlight>lessons</highlight> for high-schoolers, Flatiron has considered their interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在为高中生传授课程的时候，学校考虑到了这些学生的兴趣。

word_usage.usage: lesson作“功课；课”解时多用于复数形式；作“一堂课；一节课”解时多用于单数形式；作“教训；经验”、“榜样”解是可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A study has found that educational TV shows come with an added <highlight>lesson</highlight> that influences the child's behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究发现，教育电视节目带有影响孩子行为的附加课程。

examination_example.sentence: He also admits that if he had children of his own, he would encourage them to take music <highlight>lessons</highlight> and go to university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他还承认，如果他有自己的孩子，他会鼓励他们去上音乐课和大学。

examination_example.sentence: That study failed to confirm Schellenberg's findings, producing no evidence that music <highlight>lessons</highlight> improved math and literacy skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究未能证实 Schellenberg 的发现，没有提供证据来表明音乐课提高了数学和识字能力。

sense_info_list.en: a thing learned by experience; punishment intended as a warning to others

examination_example.sentence: There are a few <highlight>lessons</highlight> to learn and the first one is: "Copy from one, it's plagiarism; copy from two, it's research."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一些经验需要学习，第一个是:“从一篇抄，是抄袭；从两篇抄，是研究。”

examination_example.sentence: Why is the saying "copy from two, it's research" a <highlight>lesson</highlight> to learn?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么“从两个人那里复制，这是研究”这句话是一个值得学习的教训？

examination_example.sentence: Methodologically, the <highlight>lesson</highlight> from the Jones-Knowles research is that economic welfare is multi-dimensional.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从方法论上讲，Jones-Klenow 的研究告诉我们，经济福利是多维的。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of teaching given at one time; a period of learning or teaching
a task assigned for individual study

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可指班级或全体学生, 如class 5, 也可从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课, 还可表示"(一节)课"。
课程(可包括多门科目); 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
(尤指面向学生的)讲座,课, 教训,训斥,斥责, (常指在大学里)讲课,讲授, 教训,训斥,斥责。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of teaching given at one time; a period of learning or teaching

examination_example.sentence: Our bike-riding <highlight>lessons</highlight> are so successful that we are urgently looking for more volunteers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的自行车课非常成功，所以我们正在急切地寻找更多的志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: The three hours a day, they used to spend walking to and from English language <highlight>lessons</highlight>, has been reduced to just one hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们过去每天花三个小时走路去上英语课，而现在只需一个小时。

examination_example.sentence: To date, ReBicycle has donated more than 200 bikes to those in need, and is now expanding bike-riding <highlight>lessons</highlight> as demand soars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，ReBicycle已经向有需要的人捐赠了200多辆自行车，现在随着需求的激增，它正在扩大自行车骑行课程。

sense_info_list.en: a thing learned by experience; punishment intended as a warning to others

examination_example.sentence: Whether it's rough physical play or outdoor play, kids derive important <highlight>lessons</highlight> from the chance to make things up as they go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是体力游戏还是户外游戏，孩子们都能从边玩边创造的机会中学到重要的经验。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps there will be <highlight>lessons</highlight> to learn from driver less cars, but they are not super-intelligent beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许可以从无人驾驶汽车中学到一些经验教训，但是它们并不是超级智能的生物。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可指班级或全体学生，如class 5，也可从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示"(一节)课"。
课程(可包括多门科目); 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
(尤指面向学生的)讲座,课，教训,训斥,斥责，(常指在大学里)讲课,讲授，教训,训斥,斥责。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In addition to practical skills, Pruitt's <highlight>lessons</highlight> teach teamwork, encourage self-worth, and promote feelings of community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了实用技能外，Pruitt的课程还教授团队合作、鼓励自我价值感和促进社区情感。

examination_example.sentence: Afternoons I spent taking my daughter to her ballet and horse-riding <highlight>lessons</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下午我带女儿去上芭蕾舞和骑马课。

examination_example.sentence: However, her children have learned an important <highlight>lesson</highlight> witnessing their mother earn her degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，她的孩子们在见证母亲获得学位的过程中学到了重要的一课。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸取教训；得到教训；引以为戒

examination_example.sentence: For young adults, valuable <highlight>lessons</highlight> may also be learned through volunteering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于年轻人来说，通过志愿服务也可以学到宝贵的经验。

examination_example.sentence: He's afraid his son will fall asleep in writing <highlight>lessons</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他担心他的儿子会在写作课上睡着。

examination_example.sentence: Students always take their painting <highlight>lessons</highlight> outsides.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们总是在室外上绘画课。

examination_example.sentence: He learned a <highlight>lesson</highlight> from the small boy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从那个小男孩身上学到了一课。

examination_example.sentence: We can learn a <highlight>lesson</highlight> from the story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以从这个故事中吸取教训。

examination_example.sentence: We learn our <highlight>lessons</highlight> when we experience pain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们经历痛苦时，我们会吸取教训。

examination_example.sentence: Life is really a long <highlight>lesson</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人生真的是一堂很长的课。

examination_example.sentence: That trip was a difficult but valuable <highlight>lesson</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那次旅行是一堂困难但有价值的课。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，也指某一科目的课程。
指学习某种技能的课程，也指学校里的一堂课或课本中的某一课。
指有关某一学科的系列课程，也指大学中为修读学位或取得某种资格而学习的课程。
